mutants.code:
def maximize_chef_stones(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, piles) = case
        piles.sort(reverse=False)
        chef_stones = sum((piles[i] for i in range(N) if i % 2 == 0))
        results.append(chef_stones)
    return results

mutants.mutated_line: chef_stones = sum((piles[i] for i in range(N) if i % 2 != 0))
